name: UBS AMERICAS INC
sampleDescriptions: Proposals to implement a financial transaction tax. Proposals to limit the tax exclusion for municipal bond interest. Net Operating Loss, Interest Deductibility, Base Erosion and Anti-Abuse Tax (BEAT)
Regulatory Implementation of H.R. 4172, Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform Act (including swap rules, capital and other prudential requirements, Volcker Rule and fiduciary standards). Financial regulatory
